GSD.description:
ARM: versatile: Add missing of_node_put in dcscb_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit fcd1999ba97445a12cc394f5f42ffd9116bf0185. For more details please see the references link.
